sentences.en: Any dog bite, no matter how small, needs immediate medical attention.
sentences.cn: 被狗咬后，不管伤口多小，都必须立即就医。

sentences.en: Chew each mouthful fully before the next bite.
sentences.cn: 将每一口充分咀嚼后，再吃下一口。

sentences.en: Cut the meat into bite-sized pieces.
sentences.cn: 把肉切成小块。

sentences.en: He took another bite of apple.
sentences.cn: 他又咬了一口苹果。

sentences.en: He'd gulped it down in one bite.
sentences.cn: 他一口就把它吞了下去。

sentences.en: I had to bite back a yelp of surprise.
sentences.cn: 我只好强忍住，没惊叫出来。

sentences.en: I had to bite my tongue and accept his explanation.
sentences.cn: 我只得一言不发地接受了他的解释。

sentences.en: I must learn to bite my lip.
sentences.cn: 我必须学会不乱说话。

sentences.en: I struck it away and got a bite on my forearm.
sentences.cn: 我把它打跑了，但小臂被咬了一口。

sentences.en: I think I’ve been bitten.
sentences.cn: 我好像被什么东西咬了。

sentences.en: Joe was badly bitten by the showbiz bug at the age of four.
sentences.cn: 乔四岁就迷上了演艺活动。

sentences.en: Llamas won't bite or kick.
sentences.cn: 美洲驼既不会咬人也不会踢人。

sentences.en: Look forward to eating the food and enjoy every bite.
sentences.cn: 盼着吃东西，享受每一口食物。

sentences.en: The allegation has caused one lecturer's career to bite the dust.
sentences.cn: 这项指控断送了一名讲师的前程。

sentences.en: The dog bit him and made his hand bleed.
sentences.cn: 那只狗把他的手咬出血了。

sentences.en: The dog’s been badly bitten by fleas.
sentences.cn: 狗被跳蚤咬得很厉害。

sentences.en: The wound from the dog bite had become infected.
sentences.cn: 狗咬的伤口感染了。

sentences.en: There was a bite in the air, a smell perhaps of snow.
sentences.cn: 空气非常寒冷，似乎有雪的味道。

sentences.en: Tour operators may be forced to bite the bullet and cut prices.
sentences.cn: 旅行社的经营者们可能不得不忍痛降价。

sentences.en: Wendy popped in for a quick bite to eat on Monday night.
sentences.cn: 温迪周一晚上过来匆匆吃了点儿饭。
